scripts.concat-dist: npx concat -o splitsbrowser.js banner.txt js/core.js js/util.js js/messages.js js/time.js js/result.js js/competitor.js js/team.js js/common-controls.js js/course-class.js js/course-class-set.js js/course.js js/event.js js/chart-types.js js/result-selection.js js/data-repair.js js/csv-reader.js js/oe-reader.js js/html-reader.js js/alternative-csv-reader.js js/iof-xml-reader.js js/input.js js/result-list.js js/language-selector.js js/class-selector.js js/comparison-selector.js js/statistics-selector.js js/chart-type-selector.js js/original-data-selector.js js/leg-selector.js js/chart-popup-data.js js/chart-popup.js js/chart.js js/results-table.js js/query-string.js js/warning-viewer.js js/viewer.js
scripts.concat-data: npx concat -o splitsbrowser.data.js banner.txt js/core.js js/util.js js/time.js js/result.js js/competitor.js js/team.js js/common-controls.js js/course-class.js js/course.js js/event.js js/csv-reader.js js/oe-reader.js js/html-reader.js js/alternative-csv-reader.js js/iof-xml-reader.js js/input.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run qunit-tests && npm run languages-test
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run concat-dist && npm run uglify-dist && npm run qunit-tests-min
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run concat-data && npm run uglify-data && npm run qunit-tests-data-min
